title: FS: T205 Lot - All Cards $8, $12, or $15 **FINAL PRICE DROP**

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Lot - All Cards $8, $12, or $15 **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T205 lot available for sale. As you can see by the scans, these are mostly lower grade cards. Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions. Payment via any method you prefer. Please add $2 for shipping for 1-2 cards. Three or more cards ship for free.

All cards in the first group are $8 each.
All cards in the second group are $12 each.
All cards in the third group are $15 each.
Take the remaining lot (25 cards) for $300.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

First Group - All Cards $8 each:

Harmon
Hartsel

Bump for a price drop.  All cards now $9, $13, or $17.  Thanks!
Reulbach, Schulte and Sheckard.  Email and payment sent.  Thanks, Eric
